about.title: about
about.description: I'm 19 years old high school student, who started writing code at age of 15 I created several web applications, that people are using. I have experience in both, backend and frontend.

projects_list.title: GoLibrusAPI
projects_list.description: Simple and fast Synergia Librus API wrapper written in Golang.

projects_list.title: GO_FS
projects_list.description: Easy to user HTTP file server writtend in Golang and packed in Docker container.

projects_list.title: Liobrus
projects_list.description: Synergia Librus web client. One of my most time consuming projects. First version had backend written in Python and Django. I used MySQL as database and Vue.js as frontend. I also use libraries like Chart.js or AOS.js. Version I'm currently working on will have Golang backend, MongoDB database. Frontend will be written in React, also I'll use microservices architecure.

projects_list.title: x-media (Netflox)
projects_list.description: Sharing media (videos only at current stage) platform, connected with Filmweb.pl. It gets file name and saves data from Filmweb.pl like poster, title, genres, rating etc. Backend written in Golang, connected with MySQL database. Frontend coded in Vue.js. All containerized with Docker. Continuous Integration implemented with CircleCI.

projects_list.title: DDS ($$)
projects_list.description: DDS (double dollar sign) is a web platform, which helps companies and individuals manage their expenses, incomes, generating and sending invoices, etc. Backend writtend in Golang, connected with MongoDB. Frontend and invoices theme generator written in React. Containerized with Docker. Continuous Integration implemented with CircleCI.
